en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors RM 10,000 to the Selangor Girl Guides Association!
en.content:
REPORT BY FUSIONEXCEL EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR ERNEST FERNANDEZ.

FusionExcel came to the aid of the Selangor Girl Guides Association as one of the main sponsors of the 2009 Bazaar organized by the Association on 18th April 2009. The event organized by the Selangor Girl Guides Association under the royal patronage of Y.A.M.Tengku Puteri Nor Zehan Ibni Almarhum Sultan Salahuddin Abdul Aziz Shah Alhaj aims to raise funds to build a headquarter for Selangor state's girl guides who currently do not have a place of their own to use for gatherings. Tengku Zehan, the youngest sister of the Sultan of Selangor, said they hoped to raise RM 100,000 or more during the event.

The 2009 Bazaar was officiated by D.Y.M.M. Sultan of Selangor, Sultan Sharafuddin Idris Shah Alhaj.

FusionExcel represented by Executive Director Ernest Fernandez presented a mock cheque of RM 10,000.00 sponsorship to the Association's Chairman, Yang Di Pertua Y.A.M Tengku Puan Indera Setia Selangor, Tunku Irinah Almarhum Tuanku Jaafar.

Besides the cash sponsorship, FusionExcel also presented FusionExcel's Quantum Pendants and Quantum Flasks to members of the royal family and VIPs. During the day long event, FusionExcel's team entertained a lot of curious enquiries and performed numerous demonstrations to the amazement of the participants. "News of the efficacy of FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant must certainly be getting around as we received numerous positive endorsements from the VIP visitors." said Ernest.
